sentences.sContent: On our website you can peep our video interview with R&B’s newest supergroup.
sentences.sCn: 在我们的网站可以观看到节奏布鲁斯最新超级组合的采访录像。

synos.tran: 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫

remMethod.val: 偷看颠倒过来(peep → peep)还是偷看

trans.tranCn: 瞥见， 偷看； 初现
trans.tranOther: to look at something quickly and secretly, especially through a hole or opening
